flawed_nl_solution:
Jules has to earn $200 because 1000 / 5 = <<1000/5=200>>200
He has earned $40 from starting the walks because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He has to earn $165 from distance, because 200 - 40 = <<200-40=165>>165
He has to walk 132 blocks because 165 / 1.25 = <<165/1.25=132>>132
#### 132

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 165. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
